QuestData.Title: Compassion in Devotion
QuestData.Description:
Our first order of business is to rededicate the Temple of Loyalty.
Pelagos has volunteered to stay here and help prepare for the ceremony. I requested that Nikolon bring his companions to meet us at Steward's Rest, to aid us in convincing some of the Forsworn of our new path.
Meet us there when you are able.
